Package imagingbook.pub.regions

Class BinaryRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.BinaryRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<BinaryRegion>, java.lang.Iterable<Pnt2d>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SegmentationBackedRegion
    public abstract class BinaryRegion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BinaryRegion>, java.lang.Iterable<Pnt2d>
    This class represents a connected component or binary region. It is implemented as a non-static inner class to BinaryRegionSegmentation because it references common region labeling data. A BinaryRegion instance does not have its own list or array of contained pixel coordinates but refers to the label array of the enclosing BinaryRegionSegmentation instance. Instances of this class support iteration over the contained pixel coordinates of type Pnt2d, e.g., by 
     import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
 
 BinaryRegion R = ...;
 for (Point p : R) {
    // process point p ...
 }
    The advantage of providing iteration only is that it avoids the creation of (possibly large) arrays of pixel coordinates.

      • getOuterContour

        public abstract Contour getOuterContour()
        Get the (single) outer contour of this region. Points on an outer contour are arranged in clockwise order.

        the outer contour.

      • getInnerContours

        public abstract java.util.List<Contour> getInnerContours()
        Get all inner contours of this region. Points on inner contours are arranged in counter-clockwise order.
        Returns:
        the list of inner contours.
